quiz.q: The aircraft just came out of a “B-Check”. Which statement is true regarding the Pre-Departure Service Check?
a: A PDSC is required prior to the ETOPS flight because the PDSC is not precluded by any other check.

quiz.q: What is the preferred method used to service engine oils?
a: One EQ AMT services the left engine, and another EQ AMT services the right engine.
